title: The One About Popularity
itunes:author: Sibling Rivalry & Studio71
content:encoded:
Were Bob and Monét Glindas in school or Elphabas? Find out this week as the two dive into all things popularity! They discuss their status in high school, the prestige of being popular in the New York drag scene, and they play a messy game of "Which Drag Queen Is More Popular?".

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
